Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Writer: Joby Harold, Darnell Metayer, Josh Peters
Actors: Anthony Ramos, Dominique Fishback, Luna Lauren Velez
Plot: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.
Country: United States, Canada, United Kingdom, New Zealand, Hungary, Peru, China
